CustomField.description: This field is set by Mulesoft on Company creation by calling OpenAI's endpoint to check legitimacy of the company name. If the company name is valid and data is found on the internet - the field will be false. If no information is found and company name is invalid - the field will be set to true on creation and won't be processed in Salesforce (Processing state will be updated to Dead)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is set by Mulesoft on Company creation by calling OpenAI's endpoint to check legitimacy of the company name. If the company name is valid and data is found on the internet - the field will be false. If no information is found and company name is invalid - the field will be set to true on creation and won't be processed in Salesforce (Processing state will be updated to Dead)
CustomField.label: Fake Record
